characters.name: Rita
characters.visual_prompt: A small rat with round pink body, big eager eyes, tiny pink ears, long thin tail. Wears a distinctive RED BOW on her head. Bold black outlines. Leaning forward, ready for adventure.

characters.name: Rico
characters.visual_prompt: A small rat with round blue-gray body, worried eyes, tiny ears, long thin tail. Wears a distinctive BLUE BANDANA around neck. Bold black outlines. Often leaning back, one eyebrow raised.

pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: Rita (pink rat with RED BOW) and Rico (blue rat with BLUE BANDANA) peeking around a castle doorway. Rita leaning forward eagerly, Rico hanging back nervously. Big stone castle behind them. Expression: Rita excited, Rico worried.
pages.riso_notes: Rita PINK, Rico BLUE, castle BLACK outline, doorway dramatic

pages.text: Rita and Rico saw a castle.
pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: The two rats standing together looking up at an enormous castle. Rita (pink, RED BOW) pointing excitedly. Rico (blue, BLUE BANDANA) looking uncertain. Castle looms large. Expression: Rita amazed, Rico intimidated.
pages.riso_notes: Rita PINK, Rico BLUE, castle BLACK silhouette

pages.image_prompt: EXTREME WIDE SHOT: Tiny Rita and Rico at bottom of frame, HUGE castle filling the page. Shows scale - they are SO small. Castle details in black outlines. Expression: both looking up with necks craned.
pages.riso_notes: Rats tiny PINK and BLUE at bottom, castle BLACK fills frame

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Rita's face and upper body. RED BOW prominent. MAXIMUM eager expression - eyes sparkling, smile huge, arm pointing forward. This is her catchphrase moment! Solid pink/warm background.
pages.riso_notes: Rita PINK on warm background, BOW detail in BLACK

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Rico's face and upper body. BLUE BANDANA prominent. Classic worried expression - one eyebrow raised, paw up in caution, leaning back. This is his catchphrase moment! Solid blue/cool background.
pages.riso_notes: Rico BLUE on cool background, BANDANA detail in BLACK

pages.image_prompt: DYNAMIC SHOT: Both rats running through the castle doorway. Rita (RED BOW) leading eagerly, Rico (BLUE BANDANA) following reluctantly. Motion lines. Castle interior glimpsed. Expression: Rita joyful, Rico nervous.
pages.riso_notes: Rita PINK ahead, Rico BLUE behind, doorway BLACK arch

pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: The two rats tiptoeing past a large throne with a sleeping king (shown as silhouette). Rita (RED BOW) gesturing 'shh', Rico (BLUE BANDANA) looking terrified. Expression: Rita mischievous, Rico panicked.
pages.riso_notes: Rats PINK and BLUE, king BLACK silhouette on throne

pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Parallel to previous - rats sneaking past another throne with sleeping queen (silhouette). Same poses but more confident now. Expression: Rita grinning, Rico still nervous but following.
pages.riso_notes: Rats PINK and BLUE, queen BLACK silhouette

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Rita's face lit up with absolute JOY. RED BOW bouncing. Eyes like hearts, drooling slightly. A beautiful jar of red jam visible. This is peak excitement! Expression: ECSTATIC.
pages.riso_notes: Rita PINK, jam jar PINK/RED, glow effect

pages.image_prompt: DRAMATIC REVEAL: A large orange cat emerging from shadows, eyes glowing, looking hungry. Cats tail swishing. This is THE page turn moment - maximum drama! No rats in frame, just the THREAT.
pages.riso_notes: Cat silhouette BLACK with glowing eyes, dramatic

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Rico stepping forward protectively, BLUE BANDANA flowing. For once HE is the brave one! Pushing Rita behind him. Expression: determined, brave, protecting his friend. Role reversal!
pages.riso_notes: Rico BLUE heroic pose, BANDANA prominent

pages.image_prompt: DYNAMIC/ACTION SHOT: Maximum chase energy! Cat lunging, rats running for their lives. Motion blur, speed lines, dust clouds. Rita (RED BOW) and Rico (BLUE BANDANA) side by side fleeing. Expression: terrified but determined.
pages.riso_notes: Cat BLACK silhouette, rats PINK and BLUE blurs, motion lines

pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: A large teacup with Rita's eyes and RED BOW barely visible peeking over the rim. Just her eyes and bow showing. Nervous expression. Cup on a shelf. Funny hiding spot.
pages.riso_notes: Cup BLACK outline, Rita's eyes and BOW visible PINK

pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Parallel composition - a fancy hat with Rico's eyes and BLUE BANDANA peeking out. Just his eyes and bandana visible. Nervous expression. On a hat stand. Funny hiding spot.
pages.riso_notes: Hat BLACK outline, Rico's eyes and BANDANA visible BLUE

pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: Cat sitting smugly between the cup and hat, waiting. Knows they're there. Cat has a deadpan Jon Klassen expression - patient, knowing. Cup and hat visible in frame. Tension!
pages.riso_notes: Cat BLACK silhouette center, cup and hat on sides

pages.image_prompt: DYNAMIC SHOT: Both rats bursting out of their hiding spots simultaneously! Rita from cup, Rico from hat. Surprising the cat who jumps back. Pete the Cat resilience moment! Expression: triumphant, surprising the cat.
pages.riso_notes: Rats PINK and BLUE bursting out, cat BLACK startled

pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Rita and Rico running away together, carrying the jam jar between them. Both have jam on their faces and are GRINNING. Teamwork! Expression: pure joy, messy faces, victory!
pages.riso_notes: Rats PINK and BLUE, jam jar PINK, jam on faces

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Both rats sitting together, covered in jam, licking their paws happily. RED BOW and BLUE BANDANA both messy with jam. Expression: blissful, satisfied, jam everywhere. Best friends.
pages.riso_notes: Rita PINK, Rico BLUE, jam splashes PINK on both

pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: Rita and Rico walking away from the castle together at sunset, holding paws. Castle silhouette behind. RED BOW and BLUE BANDANA visible. Expression: content, friendship, adventure complete.
pages.riso_notes: Rats PINK and BLUE, castle BLACK silhouette, warm ending
